code:
const insuranceProducts = [{
  name: "Term Life Insurance",
  description: "Provides death benefit to beneficiaries if the insured dies during the term.",
  suitableFor: ["Life Cover", "Tax Saving"],
  risk: ["Low", "Medium", "High"],
  minAge: 18,
  maxAge: 65,
  minIncome: 300000,
  premiumFactor: 0.005,
  // 0.5% of annual income as base premium
  taxBenefit: "Premium paid up to ₹1.5 lakhs qualifies for tax deduction under Section 80C."
}, {
  name: "Health Insurance",
  description: "Covers medical expenses for hospitalization, treatments, and procedures.",
  suitableFor: ["Health Security", "Tax Saving"],
  risk: ["Low", "Medium", "High"],
  minAge: 18,
  maxAge: 70,
  minIncome: 200000,
  premiumFactor: 0.03,
  // 3% of annual income as base premium
  taxBenefit: "Premium paid up to ₹25,000 qualifies for tax deduction under Section 80D."
}, {
  name: "ULIP (Unit Linked Insurance Plan)",
  description: "Combines insurance coverage with investment options in market-linked funds.",
  suitableFor: ["Wealth Creation", "Tax Saving", "Life Cover"],
  risk: ["Medium", "High"],
  minAge: 18,
  maxAge: 65,
  minIncome: 500000,
  premiumFactor: 0.1,
  // 10% of annual income as base premium
  taxBenefit: "Premium paid up to ₹1.5 lakhs qualifies for tax deduction under Section 80C."
}, {
  name: "ELSS (Equity Linked Savings Scheme)",
  description: "Tax-saving mutual fund that invests primarily in equity and equity-related instruments.",
  suitableFor: ["Wealth Creation", "Tax Saving"],
  risk: ["Medium", "High"],
  minAge: 18,
  maxAge: 75,
  minIncome: 400000,
  premiumFactor: 0.15,
  // 15% of annual income as base premium
  taxBenefit: "Investment up to ₹1.5 lakhs qualifies for tax deduction under Section 80C."
}, {
  name: "Endowment Plan",
  description: "Provides insurance coverage along with savings component for specific financial goals.",
  suitableFor: ["Wealth Creation", "Life Cover", "Tax Saving"],
  risk: ["Low", "Medium"],
  minAge: 18,
  maxAge: 65,
  minIncome: 350000,
  premiumFactor: 0.08,
  // 8% of annual income as base premium
  taxBenefit: "Premium paid up to ₹1.5 lakhs qualifies for tax deduction under Section 80C."
}, {
  name: "Critical Illness Cover",
  description: "Provides lump sum payment upon diagnosis of specified critical illnesses.",
  suitableFor: ["Health Security"],
  risk: ["Low", "Medium", "High"],
  minAge: 18,
  maxAge: 65,
  minIncome: 400000,
  premiumFactor: 0.02,
  // 2% of annual income as base premium
  taxBenefit: "Premium paid up to ₹25,000 qualifies for tax deduction under Section 80D."
}];
export default insuranceProducts;

sourcesContent:
const insuranceProducts = [
  {
    name: "Term Life Insurance",
    description: "Provides death benefit to beneficiaries if the insured dies during the term.",
    suitableFor: ["Life Cover", "Tax Saving"],
    risk: ["Low", "Medium", "High"],
    minAge: 18,
    maxAge: 65,
    minIncome: 300000,
    premiumFactor: 0.005,  // 0.5% of annual income as base premium
    taxBenefit: "Premium paid up to ₹1.5 lakhs qualifies for tax deduction under Section 80C."
  },
  {
    name: "Health Insurance",
    description: "Covers medical expenses for hospitalization, treatments, and procedures.",
    suitableFor: ["Health Security", "Tax Saving"],
    risk: ["Low", "Medium", "High"],
    minAge: 18,
    maxAge: 70,
    minIncome: 200000,
    premiumFactor: 0.03,  // 3% of annual income as base premium
    taxBenefit: "Premium paid up to ₹25,000 qualifies for tax deduction under Section 80D."
  },
  {
    name: "ULIP (Unit Linked Insurance Plan)",
    description: "Combines insurance coverage with investment options in market-linked funds.",
    suitableFor: ["Wealth Creation", "Tax Saving", "Life Cover"],
    risk: ["Medium", "High"],
    minAge: 18,
    maxAge: 65,
    minIncome: 500000,
    premiumFactor: 0.1,  // 10% of annual income as base premium
    taxBenefit: "Premium paid up to ₹1.5 lakhs qualifies for tax deduction under Section 80C."
  },
  {
    name: "ELSS (Equity Linked Savings Scheme)",
    description: "Tax-saving mutual fund that invests primarily in equity and equity-related instruments.",
    suitableFor: ["Wealth Creation", "Tax Saving"],
    risk: ["Medium", "High"],
    minAge: 18,
    maxAge: 75,
    minIncome: 400000,
    premiumFactor: 0.15,  // 15% of annual income as base premium
    taxBenefit: "Investment up to ₹1.5 lakhs qualifies for tax deduction under Section 80C."
  },
  {
    name: "Endowment Plan",
    description: "Provides insurance coverage along with savings component for specific financial goals.",
    suitableFor: ["Wealth Creation", "Life Cover", "Tax Saving"],
    risk: ["Low", "Medium"],
    minAge: 18,
    maxAge: 65,
    minIncome: 350000,
    premiumFactor: 0.08,  // 8% of annual income as base premium
    taxBenefit: "Premium paid up to ₹1.5 lakhs qualifies for tax deduction under Section 80C."
  },
  {
    name: "Critical Illness Cover",
    description: "Provides lump sum payment upon diagnosis of specified critical illnesses.",
    suitableFor: ["Health Security"],
    risk: ["Low", "Medium", "High"],
    minAge: 18,
    maxAge: 65,
    minIncome: 400000,
    premiumFactor: 0.02,  // 2% of annual income as base premium
    taxBenefit: "Premium paid up to ₹25,000 qualifies for tax deduction under Section 80D."
  }
];

export default insuranceProducts;
